channel.title: Short on Simple Solution
channel.description: Recent content in Short on Simple Solution

item.title: Convert short to float in Java
item.description: In this Java core tutorial, we learn how to convert short value into float value in Java via different solutions. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Assign short variable to float variable in Java ConvertShortToFloatExample1.java public class ConvertShortToFloatExample1 { public static void main(String[] args) { short value1 = 10; float value2 = value1; System.out.println("short value: " + value1); System.out.println("float value: " + value2); } } The output is: short value: 10 float value: 10.

item.title: Convert float to short in Java
item.description: In this Java core tutorial, we learn how to convert float value into short value in Java via different solutions. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to cast float to short value in Java ConvertFloatToShortExample1.java public class ConvertFloatToShortExample1 { public static void main(String[] args) { float value1 = 12.34F; short value2 = (short)value1; System.out.println("float value: " + value1); System.out.println("short value: " + value2); } } The output is: float value: 12.

item.title: Convert short to int in Java
item.description: In this Java core tutorial, we learn how to convert short value into int value in Java via different solutions. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Assign short variable to int variable ConvertShortToIntExample1.java public class ConvertShortToIntExample1 { public static void main(String[] args) { short value1 = 87; int value2 = value1; System.out.println("short value: " + value1); System.out.println("int value: " + value2); } } The output is: short value: 87 int value: 87

item.title: Convert int to short in Java
item.description: In this Java core tutorial, we learn how to convert int value into short value in Java via different solutions. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to cast int to short value in Java ConvertIntToShortExample1.java public class ConvertIntToShortExample1 { public static void main(String[] args) { int value1 = 99; short value2 = (short)value1; System.out.println("int value: " + value1); System.out.println("short value: " + value2); } } The output is: int value: 99 short value: 99

item.title: Convert short to double in Java
item.description: In this Java core tutorial, we learn how to convert short value into double value in Java via different solutions. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Assign short variable to double variable ConvertShortToDoubleExample1.java public class ConvertShortToDoubleExample1 { public static void main(String[] args) { short value1 = 100; double value2 = value1; System.out.println("short value: " + value1); System.out.println("double value: " + value2); } } The output is: short value: 100 double value: 100.

item.title: Convert double to short in Java
item.description: In this Java core tutorial, we learn how to convert double value into short value in Java via different solutions. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to cast double to int value ConvertDoubleToShortExample1.java public class ConvertDoubleToShortExample1 { public static void main(String[] args) { double value1 = 98.76; short value2 = (short)value1; System.out.println("double value: " + value1); System.out.println("short value: " + value2); } } The output is: double value: 98.
